Posts.HTML:
WAKE: Evolution Through Extinction - Demo V2.2 is available for play.

It is significantly altered from the first iterations. There are a multitude of changes to the way the game is presented, and how it unfolds. Also, there is a massive addition to the gameplay; the demo is now 2x as long as before.

This will likely be the final addition to gamplay length for the demo, before work on the final version is completed. But changes to functionality, bugs, and presentation will constantly be added to the demo from here on out.

*On a side-note, a fully-functional magic 8 ball has been added, with a special surprise.*

The game is located through this link:
http://www.textadventures.co.uk/review/1088/

**Please, offer any feedback possible, whether it is praise or constructive criticism. So far, feedback has been very limited (thanks sonic for your help!)."
